verses.verse: Now the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> gathered <S%H6908>together<s%> all their <S%H4264>armies<s%> to <S%H663>Aphek<s%>: and the <S%H3478>Israelites<s%> <S%H2583>pitched<s%> by a <S%H5869>fountain<s%> which is in <S%H3157>Jezreel<s%>.

And the <S%H5633>lords<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> passed <S%H5674>on<s%> by <S%H3967>hundreds<s%>, and by <S%H505>thousands<s%>: but <S%H1732>David<s%> and his <S%H582>men<s%> passed <S%H5674>on<s%> in the <S%H314>rereward<s%> with <S%H397>Achish<s%>.

Then <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H8269>princes<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%>, What do these <S%H5680>Hebrews<s%> here? And <S%H397>Achish<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto the <S%H8269>princes<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%>, Is not this <S%H1732>David<s%>, the <S%H5650>servant<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, which hath been with me these <S%H3117>days<s%>, or these <S%H8141>years<s%>, and I have <S%H4672>found<s%> no <S%H3972>fault<s%> in him <S%H3117>since<s%> he <S%H5307>fell<s%> unto me unto this <S%H3117>day<s%>?

And the <S%H8269>princes<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> were <S%H7107>wroth<s%> with him; and the <S%H8269>princes<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, <S%H7725>Make<s%> this <S%H376>fellow<s%> <S%H7725>return<s%>, that he may go <S%H7725>again<s%> to his <S%H4725>place<s%> which thou hast <S%H6485>appointed<s%> him, and let him not go <S%H3381>down<s%> with us to <S%H4421>battle<s%>, lest in the <S%H4421>battle<s%> he be an <S%H7854>adversary<s%> to us: for wherewith should he <S%H7521>reconcile<s%> himself unto his <S%H113>master<s%>? should it not be with the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of these <S%H582>men<s%>?

Is not this <S%H1732>David<s%>, of whom they <S%H6030>sang<s%> one to another in <S%H4246>dances<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H5221>slew<s%> his <S%H505>thousands<s%>, and <S%H1732>David<s%> his ten <S%H7233>thousands<s%>?

¶ Then <S%H397>Achish<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, Surely, as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H2416>liveth<s%>, thou hast been <S%H3477>upright<s%>, and thy going <S%H3318>out<s%> and thy coming <S%H935>in<s%> with me in the <S%H4264>host<s%> is <S%H2896>good<s%> in my <S%H5869>sight<s%>: for I have not <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> in thee since the <S%H3117>day<s%> of thy <S%H935>coming<s%> unto me unto this <S%H3117>day<s%>: nevertheless the <S%H5633>lords<s%> <S%H2896>favour<s%> thee <S%H5869>not<s%>.
Wherefore now <S%H7725>return<s%>, and <S%H3212>go<s%> in <S%H7965>peace<s%>, that thou <S%H6213%H7451%H5869>displease<s%> not the <S%H5633>lords<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%>.

¶ And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H397>Achish<s%>, But what have I <S%H6213>done<s%>? and what hast thou <S%H4672>found<s%> in thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> so long <S%H3117>as<s%> I have been with <S%H6440>thee<s%> unto this <S%H3117>day<s%>, that I may not <S%H935>go<s%> <S%H3898>fight<s%> against the <S%H341>enemies<s%> of my <S%H113>lord<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%>?

And <S%H397>Achish<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1732>David<s%>, I <S%H3045>know<s%> that thou art <S%H2896>good<s%> in my <S%H5869>sight<s%>, as an <S%H4397>angel<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>: notwithstanding the <S%H8269>princes<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> have <S%H559>said<s%>, He shall not go <S%H5927>up<s%> with us to the <S%H4421>battle<s%>.

Wherefore now rise up <S%H7925>early<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning<s%> with thy <S%H113>master's<s%> <S%H5650>servants<s%> that are <S%H935>come<s%> with thee: and as soon as ye be up <S%H7925>early<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning<s%>, and have <S%H215>light<s%>, <S%H3212>depart<s%>.

So <S%H1732>David<s%> and his <S%H582>men<s%> rose up <S%H7925>early<s%> to <S%H3212>depart<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning<s%>, to <S%H7725>return<s%> into the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%>. And the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> went <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H3157>Jezreel<s%>.
